title: HOUR 1 - Chicago Bears, Kevin Durant, John Middlekauff
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Chicago Bears, Kevin Durant, John Middlekauff
description:
In hour 1, Colin say its time for the Chicago Bears to "Pivot" and adjust to the new NFL. It may be time to trade RoQuan Smith. Kevin Durant is more a "Dive WR then Franchise QB", which is why Boston may be the perfect fit for him. John Middlekauff joins to talk pre-season, Dallas Cowboys and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
